metadata.title: AI Cruiser
metadata.author: R4V3-0N and Chrono Vortex
metadata.description:
THIS MOD HAS DEPENDENCIES! Make sure to patch Inferno Core and Vertex Tags and Utility Functions first!
This mod adds a new race of AI hardlight Avatars from a distant universe which will eventually be developed upon further, both with type B and C layouts as well as eventually events and lore inspired by the AI Avatar race from Captains Edition and Hyperspace by Sleeper Service.
This sample includes: - AI Cruiser type A - 3 New Weapons - Effector mk I, a projector that hacks into enemy systems - Auto Beam, a beam that after firing drops to a quick 2.5 second cooldown - Splitter Focus Beam II, a 'flak beam' that fires 4 focus beams - New Race: AI Avatar's, a synthetic race of disposable hardlight avatars with many immunities - New Augment: Hologram Emitter, an augment that lets you produce an AI hologram when one perishes
Links to Vertex and InfernoCore: https://github.com/ChronoVortex/FTL-HS-Vertex/releases https://drive.google.com/file/d/14XXh8w6SLV78nC9sU-MA0qHKCYzo21tk/view
